TEI.2.document_title: Morgan and Reed to Stephen F Austin, 08-19-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Morgan and Reed to Austin, August 19, 1832. Declining to charter schooner to transport troops to Tampico. (Omitted.)[Document is included - DML]
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 846

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Morgan and Reed to Austin, August 19, 1832. Declining to charter schooner to transport troops to Tampico. (Omitted.) [Document is included - DML]*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Harrisburg */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-19-1832">19th. Augt 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Sir, We have been favor'd with yours of the *date_mentioned n="08-17-1832">17th*/date_mentioned*. offering to charter the schooner Exert to transport the *person_mentioned*troops of *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Tampico*/location_mentioned*. A voyage of the kind you have suggested will so materially interfere with our previous arrangements that we cannot consent to let our vessel perform it. The Exert is under contract to take a load of lumber from *location_mentioned*Galveston Island*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*— She is now ready (having lately undergone a thorough repair) and will sail *date_mentioned n="08-20-1832">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*—We calculate on her arriving at *location_mentioned*Braz*/location_mentioned*. by, or before, the *date_mentioned n="09-01-1832">1st. Sept*/date_mentioned*. There is no doubt of your obtaining the Martha—. We are not prepared to say whether provissions and a sufficient number of water casks are to be had for such a voyage. We have some provissions on hand and believe there are more at *location_mentioned*Anahuac*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Morgan and Reed*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
